definition: Lorentz (name)/Hendrik Lorentz (1853-1928), Dutch physicist, 1902 Nobel laureate
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
Caltrop or puncture vine (Tribulus terrestris)/to thatch (a roof)

sentences.english: Walter Lorenz recommends that all instruments be regularly inspected for wear and disfigurement.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔特洛伦茨外科公司建议定期检查磨损和缺陷情况。

sentences.english: Certainly, Lorenz's theory has obvious defects.
sentences.chinese: 当然，洛伦茨的理论存在明显的缺陷。

definition: Neumann (surname)/John von Neumann (1903-1957), Hungarian-born American mathematician and polymath
Niels Henrik Abel (1802-1829), Norwegian mathematician/(math.) abelian
János Bolyai (1802-1860), one of the discoverers of non-Euclidean geometry
Alfred Wegener (1880-1930), German meteorologist and geophysicist, the originator of the theory of continental drift
Jean-Paul Sartre (1905-1980), French existential philosopher and novelist
